definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: The shovel is the one tool that Davis and his fellow principal investigators do not use.
sentences.chinese: 铲子是戴维斯和他的主要调查者弃之不用的工具。

sentences.english: Ruggam felled him with his shovel .
sentences.chinese: 拉根一铲子把他打倒在地。

sentences.english: Apparently the unusual, spade-like shape of Ventura's hands was a dead giveaway.
sentences.chinese: 显然，文图拉那不寻常的铲子形手准确地泄了密。

sentences.english: They also love playing with their trucks, shovels and buckets in the sandbox.
sentences.chinese: 他们也喜欢在沙坑里玩卡车，铲子，和水桶。

sentences.english: The men shoveled the sand into a cart .
sentences.chinese: 这些人用铲子把沙子装进车里。

sentences.english: He laid the spade by the door.
The artists then use axes3 and shovels4 to finish their creations.
sentences.chinese: 雪雕家们接着用斧头和铲子来完成创作。

sentences.english: When you’re in three, bring a lot of shovels.
sentences.chinese: 当你深陷三处洞穴的时候，多带些铲子。

sentences.english: Invetiably, the children help out to lift a brick here or carry a spade there.
sentences.chinese: 孩子难免要帮着搬砖或拿铲子。

sentences.english: Look at the kids making a sand castle with their buckets and shovels.
sentences.chinese: 你看有小朋友在用水桶和铲子玩堆沙堡。

sentences.english: By the way, where is the shovel?
sentences.chinese: 顺便问一下，铲子在哪里？

sentences.english: Zhou Lijun put down the pot and shovel hand with small hands.
sentences.chinese: 周立军放下锅和铲子手附上了小海的手。

sentences.english: Well, at least, there are buoys everywhere. Mighty scoops.
sentences.chinese: 至少，到处都有浮标，巨大的铲子。

sentences.english: Cecily: When I see a spade, I call it a spade .
sentences.chinese: 我看到铲子，就叫它铲子，不拐弯抹角。

sentences.english: Cecily: When I see a spade, I call it a spade .
sentences.chinese: 我看到铲子，就叫它铲子，不拐弯抹角。

sentences.english: She turned the pancake over with her the spatula.
sentences.chinese: 她用炒菜铲子把这个松饼翻面。

definition: see 鍋|锅[guo1]/see 涮鍋子|涮锅子[shuan4 guo1 zi5]/bowl (of a smoking pipe etc)
wok with a long handle/wok spatula/ladle
